department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Historical Case Studies for Strategy-making in Canada
description: The Canadian Forces College has a need for historical case studies on strategy-making in Canada for publication in the National Security Programme
full_summary:
Historical Case Studies for Strategy-making in Canada
====================================================================

**Tender Details**
-----------------

### Reference Number
WS3895236503-Doc3897168474

### Solicitation Number
WS3895236503

### Tender Closing Date
2023-03-20T14:00:00 (expired)

### Brief Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites contractors to submit a proposal to develop six selected historical case studies on strategy-making in Canada for the National Security Programme. The case studies will be descriptive in nature, without analysis, and will vary in length, estimated between 18,000 to 20,000 words.

### Technical Requirements
- Develop six historical case studies on strategy-making in Canada
- Each case study will be descriptive without analysis
- Estimated word count: 18,000 to 20,000 words
- Deliverables must be received by April 15, 2024

### Procurement Information
- **Procurement Category**: Service Award
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Business Requirements
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **End Use Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
- **Regions for Delivery**: Ontario (except NCR)
- **Contact Information**: For inquiries, please reach out to Sabrina Cheng at sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Annexes
No additional files were provided with this tender announcement.
